content: - baarekmor. Nalkappetta vishuddharahasyangal kykkondathinte shesham veendum karunayulla kartthaavin്re mumpaake naam thala kunikkanam.
Janam :- njangalute kartthaavum njangalute dyvavume, ninte thirumumpaake njangal thala kunikkunnu.

kaazhchayithil - kartthaave! Nin
thiruvullam - thushtippettu
nalla mari-cchor punyappe
tteerayaraa-nandikkenam.

yeshoo! Pithrusuthane! Njangale kaakkaname
yeshoo! Mariyasuthaa! Njangale thunaykkaname
yeshoo! Balappetutthi, yeshu sookshikka
/tyeshoo! Doshiye njangalil ninnakattaname
yeshu! Akruthyavum - paapavum mochikka
yeshoo! Vidhidivasam karuna thonnaname.

maathaavu yaachikkum - parishuddhanmaarum
naathaa! Punyam nal-kingum - maricchorkkum.
pattakkaaran:- (patinjaarottu thirinju rooshmaa cheythukondu) vathsala sahodarangale,....
janam :- aammeen. Kartthaavu avitatthe kurbbaana amgeekarikkukayum avitatthe praarththanakalaal njangale sahaayikkukayum cheyyumaa-raakatte.

melppattakkaar pattakkaarotu shemmaashanmaar
erppaataakki kartthaavivare bhoomiyithinkal
aniyicchaaravaranisham thannute sabhaye ivite
anavaratham cheythetti vasikkum sthuthikalathaale.

Vinnin naayakanaam than naatharahasyangalathaayu
mannin vilavukal (pattakkaaran') kaazhchayanacchu.
Thannute pakkalirangivaraanaayaathmaavine
ninnu viliccheetunnakame nal sharanatthaale.

Avane niyami-cchoraathmaavo-nisamshayamaayu
aaghoshatthaa-lappam thannilirangi vasicchu
athine-gaathravu- makkaasaaye-rakthavumaakkum
attahasicchee-naam cholleetuka kuriyelaayison,

1. Agnimayanmaar aare nokkil viraccheetunnu
avane meshayil appam veenjaayu nee kaanunnu
aare minnalututthor nokkukileriyunnutane
avane manmayar bhakshicchu mukham theliyunnettam.

2. Erithee puthrarahasyangalaho vinnavaritayil
eshaayaa thaan kandiva nammotu saakshikkunnu
dyvathvatthin matiyilirippu rahasyangaliva
evam meshayil aadaamyarkkaayu bhaagikkunnu.

3. Kroobenmaarute therathu pole sthiramee madbahaa
svarggatthin senakalundathine chuttikkondu
dyvasuthan thirumeniyathallo meshayilivite
kykalilaadaam makkaletutthaaghoshikkunnu.

4. Pattu dharicchavanoppam ninniha vendunnorkkaayu
(pattakkaaran') maanikyangale vithareetunnu
vaanavaritayilasooyaadosham paatundenkil
maanushasutharotaa kobenmaarkkundathu noonam.

5. Kurishippaanaayu suthane sehiyon naatti maratthe
kunjaatathine janippicchoru maramundaayavite
evite puthran kykalilaani tharaykkappettu
isahaakkinte kettukale chhedicchathumavite.

6. Thannejamaanan than divyarahasyangaleyevam
thaan kykondu valamkyyaale jeevanathaayi
pankittellaavarkkaayittum nalkeetunna
(pattakkaaraa!) vannituka samaadhaanatthaale.

7. Amalamathaam dhoopatthin kalashatthe kykkondu
athinute nalloru saurabhyatthe dhoopippicchi
ttathinaalangane lokattheyaanandippikkum
(pattakkaaraa!) vannituka samaadhaanatthaale

8 vaathsalyatthaal parishuddhaathmaavaam dyvatthaal
valartthappettavanaayi, thannute naavathilennum
dyvatthin bhavanatthin thaakkolenthunnavanaam
(pattakkaaraa!) vannituka samaadhaanatthaale

9. Bhoomiyithinkal thannaaloruvan kettappettaal
aa manujan vinnulakam thannil kartthaavaalum
kettappettavanaamennulloru (pattakkaaraa!)
vannituka samaa-dhaanatthaale. Kuriyelaayison.

10. Aazhamathinkal thannaaloruvanazhikkappettaal
aa manujan thaanuyaram thannil kartthaavaalum
azhikkappettavanaamennulloru (pattakkaaraa!)
vannituka samaa-dhaanatthaale. Kuriyelaayison.

11. Undaakatte sthuthi kartthaavinu ningalute mel
undaakatte than krupayennum punyamenikkum.
Undaakatte maar yaakkobaam malppaan thante
ormmayathum nannaayundaakattellaayppozhum.

than baliyaal paapikale rakshicchoru dyvasuthaa
nin baliyaalen kashtatha maaycchan novozhikkaname.
Gogultthaayil than maarvvu thuranno-rutthamane
daaham neekkittozhukiya neeraal chorayathaalum.

1. Ente katangalashesham nin
krupayaam esgaayathinaal
maayicchen paapangaleyum
krupayaal punyamathaakkaname.

2. Rakshaka ninte rahasyangal
shushrooshikkappettennaal
athinaal punyappettavaro-
tenne yogyanathaakkaname

3. Kartthaave ninnute nithya-
svarggamathaayoru raajyatthil
ninne shushrooshippaan njaan
ippozhumeppozhumennekkum.

4. Nithyasthuthi kartthaavinnum
vidhidivasam krupa ningalilum
nyaayaadhipathikkaardrathayi-
ppaathakanilumundaakatte.

5. Krupayullavanaam kartthaave,
krupayenmelundaakaname
krupayundaakuka, matiyanathaam
enmel krupayundaakaname.

6. Ikkurbbaana anacchullo-
(rippattakkaaran) melum
ee (shemmaashan) thanmelum
orupol krupayundaakaname.

moraan yeshumashihaa
1. Ulkkondoree nin meyyum - thirurakthamathum
shikshaaprathikaarangalkkaayu
theeraathe kuttangalaraa-nuthakeetaname
nin valamathil nilkkunnathinum,
haaleluyyaa - dhyryasametham.
Ninmodatthaazhvarayil kutippikkum neeyavare
2. Kartthaave! Njangal bhakshi-cchee nin meyyum
vishvaasatthaal paanam cheytho-
ruyirekum rakthamathum theenarakatthil
paalamathaayu theernnekaname,
haaleluyyaa jeevan nithyam.

3. Shishyarkkaayammaalikayil than - thirumeni
khandicchaadaamyarute
rakshaykkum punyatthinumaayu - than rakthatthe
kaasaa thannil chertthoru
haaleluyyaa - suthanaayu sthothram.

4. Puthujeevan ninnotu kykko-ndoraa kykal
avasaanadine vidhisamaya-
tthareethiyin rookshathayinkal - njetteetalle,
nin shythyam kondava thaane
haaleluyyaa - neettappetane.

5. Gogultthaayil rakshakanaa-vrukshatthinmel
vacchangu maricchor
netuveerppin shabdam kettittilaki, paathaalatthil
chennavarute nukamathozhicchu,
haaleluyyaa modippicchu.

paathakanaam roobelinu - jeevan moosha
mrugabaliyaal nalki-yenkil
jeevanezhum nin baliyaale
vishvaasikalaayu maricchorkka-
ngethra gunam kootum.

njangalute kartthaave! Njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Krupayundaayi njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Uttharamaruliccheythu njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Njangalute kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Ennekkum njangalute sharanavume ninakku sthuthi.
